name: Checkout Supervisor
description:
After years of working at the supermarket you've climbed your way from Trolley Pusher to CHECKOUT SUPERVISOR.

But it turns out its more stressful than you imagined! 

In CHECKOUT SUPERVISOR you are in charge of keeping your store running during a very stressful week. You will be challenged with complaining customers, broken machines, cleaning messes and stopping thieves!

At the end of each day your store will be evaluated and ranked based on how happy your customers are and how much money you took in the day!

Have fun and good luck!

Note: This is a prototype to be used for gaining feedback!
